alert.note: Alert for North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 09 at 2:17PM MDT until May 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Red flag warning for South Park and the Palmer Divide through 7 pm this evening and again from 11 am to 7 pm Tuesday. Fire Weather Watch in effect Wednesday for North Central and Northeast Colorado except the higher terrain. .Fire weather conditions will be critical across the Palmer Divide the rest of today and on Tuesday, and on Wednesday conditions will be even more widespread. Wind across the Palmer Divide the rest of today and Tuesday will be ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE DENVER AREA... ...RED FLAG WARNING IS CANCELLED FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE DENVER AREA... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IS CANCELLED FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE DENVER AREA... The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. The Red Flag Warning for the rest of today has been cancelled. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 240. * Timing...From 10 am to 9 pm MDT on Wednesday. * Winds...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Impacts...Any fire that starts will have the potential to spread rapidly. Avoid burning or any outdoor activity that may produce a spark and start a wildfire.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
